body.name: GTD Audio 2x100 Adjustable Channels UHF Wireless Cordless Handheld Microphone Mic System Ideal for Church, Karaoke, Dj Party, Range 400 ft,
features: 100 Selectable frequencies on each channel, up to 20 sets can be used at the same time
Automatic frequency scanning to find and set the most clear channel, avoiding dropout.
Automatic transmitter setup, the channel of the transmitter and receiver can easily synchronize
Backlit LCD display showing RF level, AF level, Channel Frequency and mute status
Range: Up to 400 feet ( 120 meters ). Frequency: 530Mhz - 580Mhz ( Adjustable )
body.description: GTD Audio G-622 wireless microphone system delivers superior sound quality and professional features. It is designed for a wide range professional application with 200 adjustable channels. for easy use with multiple systems, no confusing frequency groups. It can be placed next to speakers with no feedback or distortion. It is perfect for professional use at any events.

productInformation.value: #27,704 in Musical Instruments (See Top 100 in Musical Instruments) #350 in Handheld Wireless Microphones & Systems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a club DJ and also do private parties and events. I bought these last minute as my last mics crapped out on me. I was not sure what to expect due to the price (I paid almost $400 for my last set). I was and still am amazed by the sound, range, durability and quality of these mics!I recommended to 3 other DJ's in the Tampa Bay area and all 3 have purchased them and love them. They are so good, that one of the clubs I DJ at even bought them.I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't finish setup and it's sounding good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I need help one of the mic stopped working

reviews.reviewerName: Terry , I bought this item and I love it. It’s easy to set up. If you need help with it YouTube will help you out with video. I love it so much I ordered 2 more and they work great. I play classic country and it is so much easier with no mic cords. The batteries lasted two, 4 hour jobs. You need to buy bigger mic holders. These mics are much larger than regular mics. Great for the price. I only have the volume set on number 2 and master on on 3 and that is loud enough for us. We don’t play loud so they work great for us.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No mic cords
reviews.reviewText: I used this for my country band vocals and guitar mic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These mics are great for mobile DJs that need to have wireless mics for speeches, etc. I have been using this model for years. Decided to order another to replace my old unit that has visual wear on the microphones due to being thrown in a bag each weekend for years. Durable mics and receiver. Never once have I encountered interference from outside sources. Range has been just fine. They work as they should from the other side of a large room. Mine is mounted under my controller inside a flight case. These are much better than the cheaper ones and compare more to Shure. As one of the top DJs in my area, I need quality, and these meet the expectations of my clients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat them for budget mics
reviews.reviewText: I was tasked with installing a basic sound system in a school gym on a shoestring budget. Initially I thought I'd never find a decent enough wireless set in the budget I had, but GTD came through.Yes, they are cheap and the build quality isn't up to the standards of professional brands, but if you're putting it in a rack and not moving it, I don't feel like you can beat these. They have every feature you'd expect on units many times as expensive.Very intuitive to use if you're familiar with modern wireless at all. Good sound quality, EXCELLENT transmission range and good battery life in the handsets.I also have to commend GTD on their customer service. My initial unit was defective (one of the receivers would not pair with the handheld). I sent them one email and they had a replacement receiver on the way that day. I've since ordered some accessories directly from GTD and got very fast service as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: They work flawlessly! I used to have a sound co, No doubt the Shure wireless mics are one of the best. However I sold everything but put together a small DJ rig for a few of the community events we do each year. I wanted a wireless mic for the rig and decided a Shure wireless mic was too much $$$ for the 3 or 4 times a yr it gets used, And its not for band use either. I found this setup and it had great reviews, so I went with it. I am amazed how well it works. Out of the box, I mounted the receiver in the rack and put batteries in the mics and turned them on and away we go! The range is awesome and the signal is very clear. There was no feedback while walking in front of the mains and i never had to do any EQ'ing of the mics. They were that clear! If you're on a budget or you do karaoke, these are the ticket!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality at a excellent price
reviews.reviewText: Well, my first mistake was to adjust the volume down on my mixer before turning these bad boys on, lesson learned. I could not ask for more from a product at this price point. Everything about this (build quality, microphones, antenna’s and the receiver) are well made and operates better than I expected. I purchased these after trying two or three others which were returned quickly after I received them because they were faulty or defective.So happy that I stumbled onto these and expect to have them for quite some time.
